suite.name: Administrator

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.arg: SEC/S360_Enter Credentials and Login To Solution
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: SEC/S360_Open Browser And Enter URL
kw.doc: Launched browser, Navigates to specified URL

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Select From List By Index
kw.doc: Selects options from selection list ``locator`` by ``indexes``.
kw.msg: Selecting options from selection list 'id=language-list' by index 1.

kw.name: SEC/S360_Enter Credentials and Login To Solution
kw.doc: Enters the credentials and logs into the solution Where ${Var_Username} is Username to be entered ${Var_Password} is password to be entered and ${RoleValue} is the index number of role (0-Admin, 1-Operator, 2-Designer)gi

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Element Should Not Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is NOT visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds

kw.name: Input Text

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Ignore Error
kw.arg: wait until element is not visible
